fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are roleblocked, you will attack the role blocker in addition to your target.
- When you automatically kill a roleblocker, the roleblock attempt will fail.
- Roleblockers that target you will have their wills covered in blood, making it unreadable.
- At night, you may choose to spare roleblockers instead.
- Your attack will not only deal a Basic attack, but also ban the target. Even if the attack fails.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
